short_summary: \\u201c_Ripairs_\u201D of four floating docks and two gangways in L\\'Anse Au Clair, NL.
description: Description of work undertaken to remove the four existing floating docks and two wooden gangways, Conduct the salvage of saving existing pontoons, Construction of four floating docks and ramps.
full_summary:
### Floating Dock Repairs – L’anse Au Clair, NL
#### Call for Quotation
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01006953
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 30003410
**Publication Date:** September 13, 2022

**Closing Date:** September 28, 2022 at 13:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
**Contact Information:**

* Karine Plante
* Phone: 506-377-9127
* Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
* Address: 301 Bishop drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6, Canada

**Tender Description:**
A Call for Quotation has been issued for the repair of floating docks in L’Anse Au Clair, NL. 

The work includes demolition of the existing docks and wooden gangways, salvage of existing pontoons, construction of four new floating docks and two wooden gangway ramps. The floating docks are to be constructed in accordance with the specifications and accompanying drawings provided with the contract. The work must be completed 10 weeks after contract award.

**Required Documents:**
The following documents are available for download:

* Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)
* Request for Quotation (RFQ)
* Addendum 1 and Addendum 2 (Combined)

The documents are available for download from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website.

**Eligibility:**
The Contractor must be able to provide all necessary labor, materials, equipment and services to complete the work.

**Open Bidding Method:**
This Call for Quotation is an open bidding method as per the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Trade Agreements:**
This Call for Quotation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Please note that the “Tender Closing Date” mentioned in the above text has passed. As the original text states:
**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

However, I included it in the rewritten entry as it was specified in the original text.
Original text Maintained unchanged. Removed or added details only as per the rewritten entry's corrections and improvements. The format has been revised as well, making the whole document appear cleaner and more professional.
